content: **japanese version available here 1 ** both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **tools/materials ** japanese size 4/0 5/0 & 6/0 crochet hooks 2 5 3 0 & 3 5mm **note ** the gauge is 24 st/11 5 row in double_crochet **and** for pattern stitch a 模様編みａ in the pdf gauge for pattern stitch b is not listed note previously released as item 27-1 2 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/28-13/ 2 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-1/
